Subject: RE: RSO UAE - Store Closure (Renovation) - Tory Burch – Mall of Emirates- 04th Aug 2025
--------------------------------------------------
Dear All, 

Greetings, 

As you all are aware, Hoarding was done last night for Tory Burch, MOE for renovation works.

Attached pictures for your reference.

Last trading date: 04 Aug 2025.

De- merchandising will complete, handover to mall demolition contractor (by Op’s team): 06 Aug 2025.

Demolition will start from 07 Aug 2025.

Thanks & Regards 

prathap pandiyan

<Realemirates.shopreconciliations@chalhoub.com>; Eren Evci <Eren.Evci@chalhoub.com>
Subject: RE: RSO UAE - Store Closure (Renovation) - Tory Burch – Mall of Emirates- 04th Aug 2025
Importance: High

 

Dear Team,

 

Hope you are doing well.

 

As per our minutes of meeting regarding the renovation plan for Tory Burch – Mall of the Emirates, please note the following:

 

The location will be temporarily closed, with the last trading day on 04th August 2025. Handover to the Project Team is scheduled for 06th August 2025.

The boutique is expected to reopen for business in November 2025 (exact date TBC).

 

To ensure a smooth closure, each stakeholder is requested to complete the necessary actions on time:

*	@Fadi <mailto:Fadi.Habib@chalhoub.com>  Apply for Mall permits (Merchandise/Non-Merchandise transfers for Store Team and Logistics), including IT Equipment, Traffic Counter, and CCTV dismantling. 
*	@Rizaldy <mailto:Rizaldy.Amada@chalhoub.com>  IT equipment dismantling on 06th August; Service Request #: SR-1419147. 

*	@Fadi <mailto:Fadi.Habib@chalhoub.com>  Deposit Petty Cash and Cash Float in separate deposit bags, and EOD cash in a separate bag on 04th August (EOD).
*	@Ghouse <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>  Arrange TG team to collect cash deposit on 05th August 2025. Ensure Cash Collection Service Agreement is frozen until November 2025.
*	@Philip <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com>  @Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com>  Arrange SEFA team to dismantle NVR and CCTV on 06th August.
*	@Lorena <mailto:Lorena.Dimaala@chalhoub.com>  @Pierre <mailto:Pierre.Baasolo@chalhoub.com>  Hold all services (cleaning, pest control) until reopening.

Cc: Muhammed Sweadan; Rawad Hossein; Nancy Azzi
Subject: RSO UAE - Store Closure (Renovation) - Tory Burch – Mall of Emirates- 04th Aug 2025

Importance: High

 

Dear Team,

 

Hope you are doing well,

 

Booking your calendar please to align on Closing plan of Tory Burch Boutique at Mall of Emirates for renovation, last trading date is on Monday 04th Aug 2025.

BCC: 
Date: 2025-08-06 11:45
Subject: RE: RSO UAE - Store Closure (Renovation) - Tory Burch – Mall of Emirates- 04th Aug 2025
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Prathap,

Thank you for the information.

From the IT side, we have completed the removal of our equipment from the site.

However, we kindly request your support in informing the demolition team to take extra care with the following active fiber cables:

 

1.	Etisalat fiber - currently routed on the mall cable tray (Picture-1)

 

2.	Chalhoub fiber - located on the catwalk above the ceiling. Currently, the network is active and connected to the storage room used by Tory Burch, Axel Arigato & Michael Kors (Picture-2).

 

Both cables are live, and any disturbance may impact store operations.

Should you have any questions or require further clarification, please feel free to contact me at any time. Thank you.

 

    

 

Best regards,

 

 

RIZALDY AMADA	
SENIOR ASSOCIATE ‑ WORKPLACE TECH	
REAL EMIRATES LLC	
DUBAI	
‑	
UNITED ARAB EMIRATES	
+971 4 804 5000	
+9710503961602

chunks.text:
chalhoub.com> >; Eren Evci <Eren.Evci@chalhoub.com <mailto:Eren.Evci@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: RE: RSO UAE - Store Closure (Renovation) - Tory Burch – Mall of Emirates- 04th Aug 2025
Importance: High

 

Dear Team,

 

Hope you are doing well.

 

As per our minutes of meeting regarding the renovation plan for Tory Burch – Mall of the Emirates, please note the following:

 

The location will be temporarily closed, with the last trading day on 04th August 2025. Handover to the Project Team is scheduled for 06th August 2025.

The boutique is expected to reopen for business in November 2025 (exact date TBC).

 

To ensure a smooth closure, each stakeholder is requested to complete the necessary actions on time:

*	@Fadi <mailto:Fadi.Habib@chalhoub.com>  Apply for Mall permits (Merchandise/Non-Merchandise transfers for Store Team and Logistics), including IT Equipment, Traffic Counter, and CCTV dismantling. 
*	@Rizaldy <mailto:Rizaldy.Amada@chalhoub.com>  IT equipment dismantling on 06th August; Service Request #: SR-1419147. 

*	@Fadi <mailto:Fadi.Habib@chalhoub.com>  Deposit Petty Cash and Cash Float in separate deposit bags, and EOD cash in a separate bag on 04th August (EOD).
*	@Ghouse <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>  Arrange TG team to collect cash deposit on 05th August 2025. Ensure Cash Collection Service Agreement is frozen until November 2025.
*	@Philip <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com>  @Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com>  Arrange SEFA team to dismantle NVR and CCTV on 06th August.
*	@Lorena <mailto:Lorena.Dimaala@chalhoub.com>  @Pierre <mailto:Pierre.Baasolo@chalhoub.com>  Hold all services (cleaning, pest control) until reopening.

*	@Shibu <mailto:Shibu.Janardhanan@chalhoub.com>  Hold AC and Fire Extinguisher agreements until reopening.

 

Best regards,

 

________________________________

 

RAMEZ ZEBDIE

Cc: Muhammed Sweadan; Rawad Hossein; Nancy Azzi

Hope you are doing well,
